reviewText: How can you not love these guys.  This is the funny one where they end up laughing so hard it makes you laugh yourself. Classic
Great and funny ....one of our favorites
If you are feeling down, just watch this movie. You will laugh. Enjoy.

While Blotto may not be one of Laurel & Hardy`s best short films, it is still a good solid comedy and is very funny.
Proabition is still in effect, but the boys have a plan to get blasted.
Stan`s wife tries to derail the plan by pouring out their bottle of booze and replacing it with tea, mustard, and anything else she
has handy to pour into the bottle.
But suggestion is a powerful thing. And the boys still manage to get falling down drunk on the concoction.
